title: Watch: Black Panther Sightings Reported In Louisiana Parish, Residents Demand Answers
description:
Black Cats Matter.

Wildlife officials have told Louisiana residents for at least over a decade that black panthers in The Pelican State are a myth. But residents are now attempting to solve the mystery of reported black panther sightings in the area.

In other words, Louisiana residents have been seeing large black cats in the state for years, but for some reason, the Louisiana Department of Wildlife and Fisheries refuses to admit they are there.

Louisiana Wildlife and Fisheries Secretary Robert Barham said in 2013 “It’s sort of lik

title: Nine-Year-Old Sues North Carolina For Blocking Medical Gender Transition
description:

Some parents suffer from Munchausen syndrome by proxy, a medical condition where a caregiver causes an illness in a person under their care, such as a child.

And that is unfortunately what these parents have done in North Carolina.

title: Two Dudes Win Another Women's Bike Race, And They're Quite Proud Of Themselves
description:
For most of history, we had a very fair way of establishing rules for sports competitions. But then all of a sudden progressives woke up one day and decided to change everything, which subsequently destroyed women's sports.

But unfortunately, the war on women continues.

Two men who claim to be born in the wrong body dominated the podium at the Chicago Cyclocross Cup series last weekend after finishing first and second in a "women’s" event.

— (@)

In other words, two dudes won the women's bike race.

description:

But after Hamas launched a terror attack against Israel resulting in the loss of Jewish and American lives, you might consider packing the flag away for a bit. description:

A dad protested a school board's decision to relax dress code rules for kids when he suddenly stripped down to a black crop top and Daisy Dukes in front of stunned attendees, leaving very little for the imagination.

title: South Park returns, looks ready to make Leftist heads explode mocking the race and gender-swapping "Panderverse"
description:
Matt Stone and Trey Parker always seem to know when the world needs them the most, and the world needs to laugh now more than ever. The world also needs peace in the Middle East, which Matt and Trey laid out the blueprint for ten years ago.

Sadly, no one had the foresight to listen. And now we're down a key component for the Kenny Accords...

— (@)

South Park is returning with a new epic special, "South Park: Joining The Panderverse." We have to wait for the end of the month, but this thirty-second taste gives us a hint. The townsfolk are worried about AI. And the cast of white boys, in the name of tolerance and equity, have been replace

title: NYC GOP Councilwoman shows up at anti-Israel rally with a gun for protection, and the protestors can't understand why
description:
As if "NYC councilwoman" and "Republican" aren't a big enough contradiction, Inna Vernikov is also a licensed concealed carry holder. Yes, in New York City. And the Jewish councilwoman was packing at a pro-Hamas rally in Brooklyn. I'm guessing it was a means for self-defense because... know what I mean?

The anti-Israel rally was at Brooklyn College. The councilwoman opposed the rally, but still worked with the City University of New York to move it from the Brooklyn College campus onto a public street so that it would be under the purview of the NYPD. "We WILL NOT ALLOW Jewish students to be or feel unsafe."

— (@)

title: WaPo has a sad that people are being "canceled" for supporting Hamas terrorism, so let's remind WaPo who they are
description:
There are people in America who are being punished or threatened with discipline all because they exercised their right to free speech that is guaranteed to them in our Bill of Rights... to support terrorism and chant that Israel both deserved it and has no one to blame but themselves. The journalismers at The Washington Post, in a stunning lack of self-awareness, are sad about this because unlike when they support cancel culture, it's happening to people they like now.
